thread.section_title: Hole-In-One Trophies Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Hole-In-One Trophies | holeinonetrophies.com
thread.title: Chet

author: Chet
title: Chet
text:
A couple of issues along the way, but first, I need to say that I really, really like the plaque. I sent an image (photograph of the golf hole) which was then incorporated into the laminated plaque. Very nicely done--a quality product. I would certainly recommend it to anyone looking for this sort of thing.
I did, however, have a couple of issue. Both resolved very quickly with exceptionally friendly people.
First, I tried to place the order online. But I kept getting an error message saying I needed to make a choice in a drop-down menu. I HAD made that choice, but it was not being recognized for some reason. A quick call and I placed the order directly. But it also alerted the company to a problem with their system. I was given a 10% discount for my troubles.
The second issue was that the golf ball would not stay seated in the hole in the plaque. I have another, similar plaque (from another company) and the ball was easily secured in place without problems. This led to 3-4 emails back/forth with their customer service folks. I tried all their suggestions but nothing ended up working. They seemed totally perplexed by the problem--said they had never experienced it before. Offered to replace the plaque, but I chose to try using some double-sided Scotch tape. Not an ideal solution, but it works. Regardless, I was very impressed with the quick and pleasant interactions with the company. They seemed willing to do anything to resolve the problem.
Again, I am very pleased with the plaque and would recommend the company without reservations.
